meaning_str.bing:
v. 警告；告诫；提醒注意（可能发生的事）；使警惕
网络. 预先通知；警戒；警告信息

警告；告诫；提醒注意（可能发生的事）；使警惕
预先通知；警戒；警告信息

警告；提醒；告诫；劝告；使警觉；发出警报；使警惕；提醒注意（可能发生的事）

1.en: Readers warn me that this problem does not just make me rude, it means I will struggle to advance further in my career.
1.cn: 读者警告我说，这个问题不只让我显得无礼，它还意味着我难以在事业上更上一层楼。

2.en: On Sept . 9 , Bair decided that she had to call the CEO of Washington Mutual to warn him of a disagreement over the bank's ratings .
2.cn: 9月9日，伯尔决定必须给华盛顿互惠银行首席执行官打电话，警告他，自己反对该行所获评级。

3.en: He told me to warn you, he's talkingabout the Dark side of the moon. - Then they killed him. - Wait a minute, you mentioned the moon?
3.cn: 他谈到月球黑暗的一面。然后，霸天虎的人杀了他。-等会，关于月球？

0.en: I didn't kill her. I tried to warn her.
0.cn: 我没杀她，我是想警告她

1.en: No, I think she is trying to warn us.
1.cn: 不，我觉得他好像在警告我们。

2.en: We have to warn them. Billions of people will perish.
2.cn: 我们得警告他们，数十亿人将死去。

3.en: I have to warn her. Warn who? Dolores. The things they do to her. The things you do to her. I have to protect her.
3.cn: 我必须警告她。警告谁？德洛丽丝，他们对她做的事，他们对她做的事，我必须保护她。

4.en: Look, I warn you right now, don't come down on me.
4.cn: 听着，我警告你，别跟我找茬。

5.en: Well, I warn you, Dr Clarkson and I will fight to the last ditch.
5.cn: 我警告你，克拉克森医生跟我会抵抗到底。

6.en: I did warn the President. And then she shot herself in the head?
6.cn: 我确实警告了总统。然后她就开枪自杀了吗？

7.en: Yes? I know you tried to warn me. But I didn't listen. I'm sorry.
7.cn: 有事？您当初想警告我，但我没听您的，对不起。

8.en: It's really scary. Don't say I didn't warn you. This better be good.
8.cn: 真的很吓人，可别说我没警告过你们。这故事最好真的精彩。

9.en: You went there to warn her. Still one problem with your story. Why did you bring the gun?
9.cn: 你去那儿警告她，但还是有一个问题，你为什么带着枪？

10.en: Your criminal records have also been expunged. However, I have to warn you against breaking any laws in the future.
10.cn: 你们的前科纪录也都撤销了，但我得警告你们未来别再犯法。

11.en: You knew this and you didn't warn them? Little girl, you can go to a pretty dark place when you on death row.
11.cn: 你为什么不警告他们？小女孩，天晓得我被折磨到想报仇的心有多可怕。

12.en: By all means warn him, I have spent enough elvish blood in defense of this accursed land, no more.
12.cn: 那你务必警告他，我已牺牲太多精灵来守卫这片被诅咒的土地了，我不会再继续。

13.en: I'm sure there's no need to remind you, but if any of those who may be tempted to warn or turn themselves in to the authorities...
13.cn: 我相信应该不用警告你们,但只要有人自认聪明去向警察通报或自首…

14.en: You used the tunnels to infiltrate yourself into the White House, somehow conning your way into the blue sector, all to try and warn her?
14.cn: 你之前从隧道侵入白宫，还想办法进入到了蓝区，你做这些都是为了警告她吗

15.en: But I was very, very impressed by how intently you tried to warn me. I never thought I would say this, Andrea.
15.cn: 但是，当你想方设法的试图警告我时，我还是非常、非常的感动。我从没想过我会对你说这些，安吉丽雅…

16.en: No, it would just freak him out. Listen, before we leave, I should warn you, I'm a passionate man and I tend towards public displays of affection.
16.cn: 才不咧，那会吓坏他的，听着，在出发之前，我要警告你，我是个热情的男人，倾向于公开地表达我炙热的感情。

17.en: Miss Bennet, I warn you, I am not to be trifled with. A report of a most alarming nature has reached me, that you intend to be united with my nephew, Mr. Darcy.
17.cn: 我警告你，我是决不肯让人家来跟我开玩笑的。我听到一个极其惊人的消息，你快要攀上我的侄儿，达西先生。

18.cn: 那好，我自己去提醒他们。

19.en: I programmed it in to warn me of an imminent system shutdown.
19.cn: 我编程让它在系统面临紧急关闭威胁时警示我。
